mapper.select: SELECT a.content_no, a.thumbnail, a.country, a.rating, c.category_nm FROM tb_content a, tb_content_category b, tb_category c where a.content_no = b.content_no and b.category_no = c.category_no order by a.rating desc limit 14
SELECT a.content_no, b.ott_img FROM tb_content_ott a, tb_ott b where a.ott_no = b.ott_no and a.content_no = #{content_no}

SELECT a.content_no, a.thumbnail, a.country, a.rating, c.category_nm FROM tb_content a, tb_content_category b, tb_category c where a.content_no = b.content_no and b.category_no = c.category_no and b.category_no = 1 order by a.content_no desc limit #{pageSize} offset #{offset}
